product_name: Jr. RangerLand Animal Tracks Matching Game
long_description: The fun Jr. RangerLand Animal Tracks matching game tests your memory as you match animals to their tracks. Game features 24 animals and their tracks; gather the most matched pairs to win! The Jr. RangerLand Animal Tracks matching game includes a United States map with the geographic range of featured animals.
short_description: The fun Jr. RangerLand Animal Tracks matching game tests your memory as you match animals to their tracks.
